info.description:
================
Welcome to asam!
================
The atmospheric simulation application manager (asam) is a tool that aims to
make the life of both users and developers of atmospheric simulation models
easier.

Features
========

* Easy installation from the Python Package Index: |pypi_version|
* Fast development cycle with GitLab CI |build_status|
* Includes a unit test suite: |unittest_coverage|
* Provides feature tests: |behave_coverage|
* Comes with an extensive online `Documentation <https://knoop.docs.helgeknoop.com/asam/>`_ based on `Sphinx <http://www.sphinx-doc.org/>`_.

Asam was created by Helge Knoop |say_thanks|

.. |build_status| image:: https://gitlab.helgeknoop.com/knoop/asam/badges/master/build.svg
.. |unittest_coverage| image:: https://gitlab.helgeknoop.com/knoop/asam/badges/master/coverage.svg?job=unit_tests
.. |behave_coverage| image:: https://gitlab.helgeknoop.com/knoop/asam/badges/master/coverage.svg?job=behavior_tests
.. |say_thanks| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/Say%20Thanks-!-1EAEDB.svg
   :target: https://saythanks.io/to/helgeknoop
.. |pypi_version| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/asam.svg
info.name: asam
